Squirrels.Author: M.I. McAllister
Squirrels.Notes: A red squirrel with peculiar coloring.

Squirrels.Author: Ernest Thompson Seton
Squirrels.Work: Bannertail: The Story of a Graysquirrel
Squirrels.Notes: A gray squirrel. Orphaned as a baby, he was taken in and raised by a cat. Adapted into an anime series.

Mice.Author: Eleanor May
Mice.Notes: A playful mouse who spends time with his sister Wanda.

Mice.Author: Daniel Keyes
Mice.Notes: A laboratory mouse who has undergone surgery to increase his intelligence by artificial means.
